cursesilence.config.mode.name: Mode
cursesilence.config.mode.line1: Defines how curses will be hidden:
cursesilence.config.mode.line2: FULL: Completely hides the curses and the glint
cursesilence.config.mode.line3: HINT: Show a generic 'cursed' enchantment, and lets the item glow
cursesilence.config.mode.line4: LEVEL: Shows the amount of curses an item has, but not which ones
